name: Fluffy Developers
description:
Fluffy Developers


Welcome to the exciting world of game development, where you will take on the role of an otaku judge! You will find yourself at the center of events, meeting three talented and attractive game developers. Go through exciting challenges and tests to choose the winner among them. Be prepared for the girls to be ready to do anything to make their game win. Immerse yourself in the world of game development with Fluffy Developers.

The game is a visual novel:



Also presented are mini-games created by the developers, allowing you to immerse yourself in an engaging gaming experience. Here is one of them:

Features:


  • Three Heroines
  • Vibrant CG Artwork
  • Image Gallery
  • Fast-Paced Plot with a Focus on Action
  • High-Quality Soundtrack
